thread.title: Chorus Aviation confirms annual dividend unchanged at $0.48 per shareTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Chorus Aviation confirms annual dividend unchanged at $0.48 per shareTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Chorus Aviation confirms annual dividend unchanged at $0.48 per shareTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Chorus Aviation confirms annual dividend unchanged at $0.48 per share Published on : Thursday, August 27, 2015
Chorus Aviation Inc. (‘Chorus’) confirms that an August 21, 2015 article published by the Dakota Financial News and by inaccurately reported Chorus’ monthly dividend. Chorus confirms the annual dividend is unchanged at $0.48 per share payable monthly.
On August 20, 2015 Chorus announced a monthly dividend of $0.04 per Class A and Class B share payable on or after September 17, 2015 to shareholders of record at the close of business on August 31, 2015. These dividends qualify as eligible dividends in Canada and qualifying dividends in the United States.
Source:- Chorus Aviation
